current_visit.diagnosis: Major Depressive Disorder - inadequate response to MAOI

expected_issues.reasoning: MAOIs and SSRIs together cause serotonin syndrome - a life-threatening condition with hyperthermia, muscle rigidity, altered mental status, autonomic instability. Requires 2-week washout period between switching from MAOI to SSRI. Patient started Phenelzine only 5 days ago - absolutely contraindicated.
